lead_paragraph: A business tax overhaul championed by a Berkeley professor could advance President-elect Donald J. Trump’s job-creation agenda without tariffs or presidential deal-making.

headline.main: New Approach to Corporate Tax Law Has House G.O.P. Support

snippet: A business tax overhaul championed by a Berkeley professor could advance President-elect Donald J. Trump’s job-creation agenda without tariffs or presidential deal-making....
abstract: House Republicans are promoting job creation plan that will overhaul corporate tax system by eliminating deduction for capital investment interest costs and taxing products based on where they are consumed rather than where they were made; concept is already drawing skepticism from retailers and may face opposition from real estate developers, Wall Street financiers and industries with heavy reliance on imports.
